Title: Relates to financing of a certain litigation liability by the city of Long Beach
Summary: Relates to financing of payment of a final judgment or a compromised or settled claim against the city of Long Beach in the case of Matter of Haberman v. Zoning Board of Appeals of City of Long Beach decided in the Nassau County Supreme Court.
LawCode: Amd ยง11.00, Loc Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the local finance law, in relation to financing of a certain litigation liability by the city of Long Beach
